ErrorCode.Description: Success!
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Process Completion Successful
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Process Completion Successful

ErrorCode.Description: Failure!
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Check the error details for more information.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

ErrorCode.Description: OS Unsupported
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: The OS used by the replicated virtual machine is not supported by Azure SiteRecovery or Migrate.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Please check the support matrix for Azure Site Recovery and Migrate. Contact support if you need further guidance.

ErrorCode.Description: HV Drivers Missing
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Hyper-V drivers are missing on the replicated virtual machine.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Please check for all necessary Hyper-V drivers for azure vm and retry the operation.

ErrorCode.Description: Tools like dracut are missing and some hydration operations cannot be performed
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Check the error details for more information.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

ErrorCode.Description: Grub Configuration File is missing
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Check the error details for more information.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

ErrorCode.Description: Guest Agent is already present on the VM hence there is no need to install it
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Check the error details for more information.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Continue the process

ErrorCode.Description: Guest Agent Installation Failed
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Check the error details for more information.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

ErrorCode.Description: Image Regeneration using dracut failed
ErrorCode.PossibleCause: Generating new initramfs kernel image with Hyper-V drivers failed. This can happen if a library dependency of dracut tool is unfulfilled or the image backup failed as system disk is running low on space.
ErrorCode.RecommendedAction: Please check whether dracut is correctly installed on source VM and there is enough space to allow backup operations.
